You were six year old David, a typical boy with blond hair and green eyes. You were laying on the couch one day reading a book. You had heard over the news lately of a new virus that was effecting kids of a younger age but your mommy always pushed you out of the room when those stories came on.

You were almost done with your book when there came a hammering knock on your door. Your mommy opened it and you saw Mrs. Drant standing on your porch, a scared look on her face.

"Liz, what's wrong?" You mommy asked.

"It's Jake, he was exposed to the virus!" Mrs. Drant shouted. It was then you started to hear loud crashes and other noises from across the street. Looking out the window you saw your best friend Jake growing out of his house. His head was already pushing through the roof, and he had a happy grin on his face. As the roof crumbled to the ground Jake's peepee pushed its way through the front wall.

Then further down the block you spotted your girlfriend Sally also growing out of her house, her parents and sisters desperately escaping through the back door as the blond stepped through the front wall. At the opposite end of the street a five year old girl was sobbing as she grew out of her cloths.

"David, where are you?!" Your mommy called into the living room.

152333221221.content:
Kelly, a blond 10 year old girl, sat working in the school garden by herself, something she was more than ok with. Not to say she wouldn't appreciate the help, but being a quiet, somewhat shy girl who was very small for her age, she tended to attract the attention of bullies and the like; so doing something she enjoyed on her own was a nice break.

As she finished planting a few things she went o go get some plant food only to notice an unusual looking large green bottle. Picking it up she turned it around to look at the label

"Jumbo-Gro?" she looked confused at the unfamiliar name. "that's not what the school normally gets."

Realizing it was the only plant food available Kelly shrugged and was about to use it when she heard an unpleasantly familiar voice.

"Hey Shrimp what 'ya doing" Kelly looked up to see Adam, a taller than average11 year with brown hair who frequent bullied her, walking towards her.

"I was just working on the garden..."

Adam stopped and looked around at the garden. "huh, you know you're pretty good at getting plants to grow..."

"Th...Thanks?"

"Too bad you can't figure out how to make yourself grow Tiny."

As Adam laughed at his joke, Kelly sighed to herself before opening the bottle so she could get back to work. However, before she could even get started the bottle of Jumbo-Gro was snatched out of her hands by Adam

"Hey this stuff helps plants grow right?"

"yea..."

"That Gives me an idea that might help you..."

Before Kelly had a chance to ask what Adam meant, he suddenly shoved the bottle in her mouth knocking her over and causing her to accidently swallow some of its contents before it fell to ground. Pulling herself up coughing and sputtering Kelly watched as Adam walked away laughing.

"Kelly are you ok?" Kelly looked over to see her friend Cat, a black haired 10 year old girl, running towards her. "Adam didn't hurt you did he?"

Manage to compose herself Kelly sullenly looked at Cat "no, not really, I just ended up swallowing some plant food by accident." Kelly coughed a little. "I should be fine..."

"Even if your fine he shouldn't be doing stuff like that." Cat started to storm away from Kelly. "And I'm going to give him a piece of my mind..."

As she watched Cat storm off, Kelly shivered and felt an odd feeling in her stomach

---------------------------------------------
"Hey you Jerk" Cat was running towards Adam who was walking near the school building

Adam turned around to see cat headed his way. "What do you want shorty?"

Cat stopped in her tracks a few steps from Adam. "Shorty, I'm not short."

"I mean i guess compared to that shrimp you hang around with you're not." Adam took a step forward, getting right in Cat's face looking down at her to accentuate the few inches difference in their height. "But really you're not actually tall, your just a jumbo shrimp." Adam then shoved Cat to the ground

As Cat hit the ground she prepared for the inevitable cheap shot Adam was going to deliver, but it never came. Looking at Adam Cat noticed he was staring up at something behind Cat in shock.

"Well if she's so small then why don't you pick on someone more your size?" Came a strangely familiar voice from behind Cat. "Well?"

At the second prompting Adam bolted around the Corner of the school building into hiding. As Cat started to get she looked over behind her to see Kelly standing there at least 10 feet tall

"Hope it's not a problem, but I thought you wouldn't mind a little backup"

"or a lot of backup in your case..." Cat stared up in awe at Kelly. "What happened to you?"

"I'm not sure when you left my stomach felt weird and suddenly, out of nowhere, I started growing until well..." Kelly motioned at herself. "I guess i must have eaten something weird..."

"Yeah but what could you have eaten to cause you to grow so much?" Cat thought for a second, the something occurred to her. "The plant food!"
152333221221.title: Queen Size Kelly.

choices: During the confrontation Cat snuck by and grabbed the Jumbo Gro
After getting up Kelly heads to the garden and grabs the Jumbo Gro
Adam hid the Jumbo Gro, but someone new finds it and learns what it does
1523332212212.content:
Adam didn't get too far before his Curiosity got the better of him; Sure he was probably better off not being near the now giant Kelly, but he needed to know why she was so big. Sneaking back towards the two girls, making sure to stay out of their site.

"I guess i must have eaten something weird..."

"Yeah but what could you have eaten to cause you to grow so much?" there was a brief pause, then Cat blurted something out. "The plant food!"

Adam stopped listening. He supposed it made as much sense as anything for the plant food to do this; but if that's what made Kelly grow, then that means he was the one who made her a giant. Adam buried his face in his hands and let out an angry groan, but then realized the girls were still talking.

"C'mon Kelly, lets go test if I'm right"

Adam glanced around the Corner, seeing the two girls walking away towards the school garden. Adam need to move quickly; He need to fix his mistake by becoming bigger than Kelly. Thankfully he knew a short cut throuhg the school to the garden.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----

"I'm still not sure if its the plant food Cat?"

"Well thanks to that jerk Adam it was the last thing you drank before growing so it makes sense, besides have you had anything else weird today?"

"Not really, just my normal cereal for breakfast and then the cafeteria food for lunch."

"I'm not sure i would call the cafeteria food normal," Both girls laughed at this comment. "but even if i wouldn't be surprised if they put some crazy chemicals in the food that could cause this; if thy did you wouldn't be the only Giant walking around."

"I guess that makes sense."

"though honestly I'm not sure its the plant food, but i want to test; worst case I'll probably get a stomach ache, but if I'm right then we can both be Giants." Cat looked up at Kelly smiling. "Wouldn't that be cool?"

Kelly looked down at Cat. Kelly really liked being the biggest and wasn't in any rush to give up that spot or even share it, so she wasn't sure about Cat growing into a Giant as well. Then again Cat would still be giant eve if she only came up to Kelly's shoulders so Cat growing didn't have mean Kelly wouldn't still be the biggest; besides even if she did, It would mean the plant food worked and Kelly could always get bigger if needed. "Yeah that does sound fun."

"Sup' shrimps?" Came a familiar voice off to the side.

" Who are you calling a shrim..." Kelly turned towards the voice about to read Adam the riot act, only to find she was eye level with a belly button, looking up she saw that Adam was now twice her own height and smirking down at her.

"You, Shrimp."

Kelly's jaw fell as it set in that Adam was again bigger than her and by a large margin "how?"

"Well i heard Cat's idea and just had to test it for myself, and she was right." Adam bent over getting right in Kelly's face. " So i guess it was my mistake that your a giant, but no worries I'm bigger again so its all good." Adam pushed the smaller giant to ground before standing up and walking away. "Now that we all know our place I need to make sure a few teachers know their place as well."

1523332222111.content:
David was just a normal six year old going about his day. For the most part it had been a normal Saturday for him. He had woken up, watched cartoons, played with his friends and eaten his dinner. Now in his pajamas he was in his bed getting ready to go to sleep. The only thing was he had been feeling funny all day long.

From the moment he woke up to the moment he was in bed his peepee had felt funny, at some points of the day it even felt a little hard. He had ignored it all day since it didn’t feel bad but now that he was in bed he couldn’t ignore it any more.

As he layed in bed he tossed and turned a bit under the covers. The strange feeling spreading through his body. Moving his blanket out of the way he looked down to see peepee sticking up as if it was trying to pop out of his jammies. He thought about getting his mommy for help but something made him reach out to touch it instead.

The moment he did the warmth in his body got stronger and he let out a giggle from the good feeling he got, not noticing his jammies getting a little tighter. Touching it again only intensified the feeling as he watched his peepee get even bigger! Giggling as his body started to swell as he played with himself.

Soon tears forming all over his pajamas as he takes up more and more room on his bed. Totally absorbed by the new feelings coming over him he continues to grow faster and faster as he begins to stroke himself off for the first time.

With one large spurt he bursts out of his pajamas and his legs stretch off his bed. Realizing he’s growing David could only smile and went back to playing with himself, filling more and more of his bedroom. Soon his dick had grown so large it was pressed against the ceiling and his bed collapsed under his steadily growing form. Hitting 10 feet tall and not showing any signs of slowing. A new feeling welling up inside him as he approaches the edge of his first orgasm.

info.brief_description: Kids begin growing in various ways and having their way with the world
info.description:
The return of one of my favorite interactives. Original was taken down for reasons I never learned, so I wanted to restart it here. All the thanks to the original author.

Rules:

1) Only those under 13 can grow. No giant/ess teenagers

2) Clothing does not grow with the kids. It just doesn't make sense it would

3) Please make each chapter at least 5 sentences. Any chapters with less will be given a chance to lengthen them, or I will alter them if not.

4) Have Fun!
